name: Over The (NOT) Gates
description:
Over the (NOT) Gates is a Platformer that will teach you, trough puzzles, how logic gates work.

Remember: You must die first to understand how to progress! Don't worry, it shouldn't be too hard. ;)

One BIG tip:
GO SLOW! Don't charge into the levels, try to study it first.

Credits:
Logic gate background: https://www.vecteezy.com/free-vector/circuit%22%3ECircuit - Vectors by Vecteezy

Sound Effect
